languages.text: "Идем. Я уже отправил{mf||а} прошение, чтобы тебя восстановили в звании".
"Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."
languages.original_text: "Идем. Я уже отправил{mf||а} прошение, чтобы тебя восстановили в звании".

traits.locale_text: "Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."
"Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."
"Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."
"Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."
"Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."
"Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."

languages.text: 「来い。君を復職させるための嘆願書は、すでに提出している」
languages.original_text: "Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."

traits.locale_text: 「来い。君を復職させるための嘆願書は、すでに提出している」

languages.text: "Kommt mit mir. Ich habe bereits eine Petition eingereicht, Euch wieder in den aktiven Dienst zu versetzen."
languages.original_text: "Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt mit mir. Ich habe bereits eine Petition eingereicht, Euch wieder in den aktiven Dienst zu versetzen."

languages.text: « Venez. J'ai déjà soumis une pétition pour vous permettre de réintégrer vos fonctions. »
languages.original_text: "Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."

traits.locale_text: « Venez. J'ai déjà soumis une pétition pour vous permettre de réintégrer vos fonctions. »

languages.text: «Venga conmigo. Ya he enviado una solicitud para que lo restituyan a su puesto».
languages.original_text: "Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."

traits.locale_text: «Venga conmigo. Ya he enviado una solicitud para que lo restituyan a su puesto».

languages.text: “跟我来吧，我已经提交了请愿书，要求你官复原职。”
languages.original_text: "Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."

traits.locale_text: “跟我来吧，我已经提交了请愿书，要求你官复原职。”

languages.text: "Gel. Görevine iaden için çoktan dilekçe sundum."
languages.original_text: "Come. I have already submitted a petition to have you reinstated."

traits.locale_text: "Gel. Görevine iaden için çoktan bir dilekçe sundum bile."
